Articles.Content:
How can I rotate parts more... specifically? I mean, with the WASD keys I can only rotate them in 90 degree increments.

I\'ve seen videos of people rotating them practically degree by degree.
Hold SHIFT and use the WASDQE keys for fine adjustments.

Hold SHIFT and use the WASDQE keys for fine adjustments.

Thanks! Now I can make awesome stuffs >:3

Mods can lock this thread now to avoid clutter.
